!Asamah: The sacred ax known as Gazkh was originally bestowed upon the ancient Elkrokhian warriors by Shilen. It had the power to seal dinosaurs in their prison to preserve the safety of the island. When it was broken, we think there was a backlash of negative energy. [Quest _126_IntheNameofEvilPart2 asamah_q126_6.htm|"What negative energy?"]
